rule.name: createCaseForm
rule.definition: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout"( label: "Create a Case", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(label: "Title", required: true, value: ri!title, saveInto: ri!title), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "Description", instructions: "Please include detailed information about the environment type (e.g., production, UAT, development, etc.), OS, system resources, etc.", required: true, value: ri!description, saveInto: ri!description ), apply(#"_a-0000d825-eb59-8000-e787-010000010000_1267"(ri!files, _), 1+fn!enumerate(count(ri!files))), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownFieldByIndex"( label: "Category", choiceLabels: { "General", "home.appian.com", "Hardware", "Software", "Email", "HQ ID Cards", "VPN", "Phone", "Network", "Peoplesoft", "Postini", "Smartphones", "Web Conferencing" }, value: ri!category, saveInto: ri!category ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownFieldByIndex"( label: "Priority", instructions: "CRITICAL: Revenue-impacting enterprise issues that affect the entire company. HIGH: issues that may potentially become revenue impacting but do not affect the entire company. MEDIUM: issues affecting a single user or for enhancement requests that need to be completed to avoid impending revenue loss. LOW: issues that have known workarounds, issues that do not affect revenue, or enhancement suggestions.", choiceLabels: { "1 - Critical", "2 - High", "3 - Medium", "4 - Low" }, value: ri!priority, saveInto: ri!priority ) }, buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonArrayLayout"(buttons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidgetSubmit"(label: "Submit", style: "PRIMARY") }) )
